nodes.text: Arns Grimraker was a cyborg salvage operator who visited the planet of Hoth in the wake of the Battle of Hoth. He and his crew flew Gun tugs and used a GR-75 medium transport, the Death Merchant to haul their spoils. While on the ice world, he encountered Wedge Antilles and Wes Janson, who killed him while fending off the scavengers.
Grimraker's left eye was artificial, along with his left arm, which ended in a claw.
